[Page Title: SPECIAL EVENTS & OYSTER CLASSES — NICO | Oysters + Seafood]

0 New Year, New Cheers Tickets 
Belly up to the raw bar for this unique offering at NICO. You will learn how to shuck an oyster and all about the various methods used to farm these delicious morsels. During this 2-hour hands-on class, you will enjoy 1 dozen carefully curated oysters paired with 2 glasses of wine. We will also send you home with a copy of

.
The NICO Oyster Hunt 
Every Wednesday at 6 PM. $75++ per person. To book your weekly class, visit our page , or call .
Weekly Classes Open Table 843-352-7969 Private Classes 
$450++ minimum for up to 6 guests. For each additional guest, $75++ per person. Day and time based on availability.To book your private class, contact

Phone: (843) 944 6476, ext 2Email: info@nicoromohg.com
